author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

In the context of #25090, this PR modernizes EventWithHistoryEDFilter by
- Move to `edm::global` module type
  * The contained `EventWithHistory` objects appear to be thread-safe by visual inspection and by not being flagged by the static analyzer
- Remove empty methods
- Use range-for
- Use trailing underscore for member data following the code guidelines

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.
title: Modernize EventWithHistoryEDFilter
